extendedInfo.description: Experience the most stylish Holo light and dark Android calendar app with 6 powerful views and 5 beautiful widgets.Â Nominationsâ #5 spot in Android Headlines: Top 10 Best Android Apps â June 2013 â #4 spot in Android Authority: The Best Android Widgets! â May 2013  Â Recommendationsâ âDigiCal is beautiful, functional, and wrapped in an easy to read, clean design.â Holo Everywhereâ âDigiCal takes it to the next level with some really nice enhancementsâ - Talk Androidâ âThe widgets are really fantastic and work brilliantly on phones with HD displays.â â Android HeadlinesÂ âº Try out the free version first!DigiCal+ is the premium version of DigiCal. By purchasing DigiCal+, you are directly supporting development and you will have access to the paid-only features.Â DigiCal+ premium features: â Beautiful month widgetâ Extra widget configuration options: background transparency and custom font sizesâ Color picker: custom background and text color for the day, day list, list, grid and month widgetsâ Ads freeÂ â Sync with all calendarsDigiCal is a stylish and user friendly calendar app that syncs all your appointment with Google Calendar, Outlook and Exchange. Â âª 6 powerful and stylish calendar viewsChoose from the day, week, agenda, month, text month and list view in portrait and landscape mode. Â âª 5 stunning and functional widgets  Make use of the fully customizable list, grid, day, day list and month widgets.Â âª Android Holo light and dark theme The clean and intuitive user interface is available for smartphones and tablets running Android 2.2+.Â â Unique built-in location search Adding a location to your appointment has never been easier. All you need to do is type in the name of the place (cafe, store, and park) and DigiCal will look up the address and save it. Â â Integration with Google Now Google Now (Android 4.1+) will know where you'll need to go, if youâve saved the location. It'll watch current traffic, plan your route and notify you when you should leave.Â  â Improved notificationsOur notifications are upgraded with shortcuts for snooze, maps and navigation.Â âSmart action barThe smart action bar makes it quick and easy to edit, move, copy, paste and delete events.Â  â¤ Translated in 21 languagesThanks to the hard work of our volunteers DigiCal is now translated into 21 languages. If you find a mistake, please let us know.Â Key features:â Stylish and intuitive user interface in Holo dark and light theme â 6 unique calendar views (day, week, agenda, month, text month and list)â 5 beautiful and fully customizable widgets (list, grid, day, day list and month) â Built-in location search for quickly adding locations to your eventsâ Google Now (Android 4.1+) support, notifying you when it's time to leave by planning your route, checking traffic and calculating your travel timeâ Improved notifications with shortcuts for snooze, map and navigationâ Smart action bar for quick editing, moving, copying, pasting and deleting eventsâ Event pop-up makes it easy to go through your individual eventsâ Gestures like pinch to zoom and swipe to navigate are supportedâ Fully compatible with Android 2.2+Â  â Do you need help or want to give us some feedback, feel free to contact us at digical@digibites.nl.Â  âº For tutorials and FAQ, please visit our support page: https://digibites.zendesk.com.

reviews.title: Monthly widget scrolling
reviews.comment: Great app... Beautiful and professional looking... worth every penny.  Just wish the month widget allowed users to scroll between months...I\'m only able to see the current month. It\'s there a way to do this that I\'m missing?
reviews.author: turquoise pink

reviews.title: What a great program
reviews.comment: I have used a lot of the currently available calendar programs I have just switched over from ACalendar to Digical. What a great program I used it for about an hour and paid for the pro version. the look and feel is second nature to use and the included Widget works flawless Great job
reviews.author: Shawn Smith

reviews.title: A must have...
reviews.comment: Presents a large amount of information in numerous clear and concise views.  Options are plentiful to satisfy personal preferences.   Easy integration with Exchange and multiple other calendar sources.    Responsive support.    It is the foundation for wirelessly managing my virtual consulting practice.
reviews.author: Norm Weiner

reviews.title: Awesome calendar app
reviews.comment: DigiCal is one of a dozen apps that I use every day. I didn\'t need widgets but I bought a license to support development. Keep up the great work!
reviews.author: Scott McGee

reviews.title: Love this
reviews.comment: The ONLY calendar i\'ll ever use again. Bought the paid version to support the dev. Great job!
reviews.author: Alyssa Littleton

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Best calender app on the marke. I\'ll use it forever, I love the colour collaboration and the widgets. One thing, I wish i could make events reoccur forthnightly. Unless I\'ve missed it,  Can you guys please add this down the track?
reviews.author: Melrick Dias

reviews.title: Feature missing
reviews.comment: Great app but I would love to see auto refresh
reviews.author: Tomas Sylverberg

reviews.title: I prefer Digical to others
reviews.comment: I have tried Samsung S planner, aCalendar, and others and Digical wins hands down. I bought the paid version. Great flexibility in repeating events, superb weekly agenda view, very useful widgets (I have a 6 and a 15 day widgets) that start Today, and they are very responsive: I had a.problem.with Exchange view of Digical events, and they fixed it in 2 days.
reviews.author: victor zlotnicki

reviews.title: Repeating events added at last. Thank u
reviews.comment: It is now possibly the best looking and functional calendar out there, after the latest update with additional options for repeating events. It took a while to see this added on but I\'m happy to endorse it as a great calendar now. Thank u
reviews.author: Daniel Reyes Martin

reviews.title: Best calendar on market, great dev support
reviews.comment: Best calendar on market, great dev support.  Downloaded digical after simple calendar went full retard and couldn\'t be happier.  The program is beautiful, customizable, and intuitive, and I received quick and courteous support after having a small issue with download.  Just buy it.
reviews.author: Pete Luscombe

reviews.title: Better than SOME established apps over there...
reviews.comment: To be frank - after playing with this app for a couple of hours, I have decided to make it my default calendar. Essentially dropping Pocket Informant (incidentally did a bungled up job of getting out a good application and maintaining user loyalty) in its favor...  In my support of the developer, I\'ve even purchased the unlock key.
reviews.author: Alfred Rodriguez

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Dev very helpful
reviews.author: Carl Hartopp

reviews.title: great calander
reviews.comment: i love this calendar it is the best one I have been using since my first Android now works great on my s4
reviews.author: jimmy brown

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Very impressed, honestly couldn\'t ask for more.
reviews.author: Mathew Rossi

reviews.title: Favorite
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried lots of different calendars over the years.  No more! Syncs with all my devices and so easy to set up. And updates just keep making it better.  A+
reviews.author: Denise Etten

reviews.title: Worth the Coin
reviews.comment: I bought this because the free app deserved supporting.  Good developer response when I emailed them with a feature that was broken - they pushed out a release fixing it, and numerous other things, within a few days.
reviews.author: Nathan Phillips

reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL LOOK
reviews.comment: But it\'s a BIG shame that you can\'t COLOR your events = the text, either by highlight it or just the text itself, unlike most other calendars, I\'ve tried, for example Google calendar: but not transparent. I choosed this calendar due to the BEAUTIFUL, AND the transparent look. I\'m currently looking for another calendar however. Everything has the same color. This makes the overview for example in month wiev from home screen, very difficult.  Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Yasemin Nielsen

reviews.title: Finally
reviews.comment: A calendar app as good as iOS.
reviews.author: Brandon Thompson

reviews.title: Busy ppl
reviews.comment: Awesome app keeps my life organized best for busy ppl.
reviews.author: Sabrina Dyda

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: You\'ll love it
reviews.author: Greg Thoe
